title: Bonus: ArtCurious Announcements--New Season + TRAVEL WITH ME!
description:
Hi everyone! We’ve got a few brief announcements for you. Here’s the quick recap of today’s episode:

Season 11 is coming on April 18! Subscribe and don’t miss it.

We’re doing virtual and in-person events this summer and fall. Email me or connect with me on social media with your venue suggestions, and/or tag or contact your favorite venue on social media to alert them to your suggestion!

Finally, we are traveling to FRANCE this summer. You are invited to join me in the French Riviera to enjoy all things Modernism. Matisse, Picasso, Cézanne, Chagall… so many big-name artists who flocked to the French Riviera for that gorgeous sunlight and joie de vivre. We’re spending a glorious week in Nice and I want you to come with me! Visit our partners at Like Minds Travel—or see our events and travel page—for all the details.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Jennifer Dasal/ArtCurious

content:encoded:
Hi everyone! We’ve got a few brief announcements for you. Here’s the quick recap of today’s episode:

  1. Season 11 is coming on April 18! Subscribe and don’t miss it.
  2. We’re doing virtual and in-person events this summer and fall. Email me or connect with me on social media with your venue suggestions, and/or tag or contact your favorite venue on social media to alert them to your suggestion!
  3. Finally, we are traveling to FRANCE this summer. You are invited to join me in the French Riviera to enjoy all things Modernism. Matisse, Picasso, Cézanne, Chagall… so many big-name artists who flocked to the French Riviera for that gorgeous sunlight and joie de vivre. We’re spending a glorious week in Nice and I want you to come with me! Visit our partners at Like Minds Travel—or see our events and travel page—for all the details.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
